taxonomicnotes: It is currently under revision. Teleogramma brichardi is possibly a complex.
rationale: Urbanisation at Pool Malebo (Stanley Pool) poses threats for the Kinsuka region, which is supposed to be the only correct location at this moment.
evaluator: Brummett, R., Mbe Tawe, A.N., Dening Touokong, C., Reid, G.M., Snoeks, J. Staissny, M., Moelants, T., Mamonekene, V., Ndodet, B., Ifuta, S.N.B., Chilala, A., Monsembula, R., Ibala Zamba, A., Opoye Itoua, O., Pouomogne, V., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.
